title: What’s Up with Primož Roglič? Red Bull Captain Dodges Bullet on the Galibier: ‘I’m Still Here’
content:
Roglič limits losses in explosive opener. That's all that matters in this Tour de France full of questions and uncertainties among all the major favorites.

Read the full article at What’s Up with Primož Roglič? Red Bull Captain Dodges Bullet on the Galibier: ‘I’m Still Here’ on Velo.
author: ahood
